head.title: Extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdShortName}} to detect and extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} without additional tools.

header.title: Extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Easily locate and extract embedded images from PDFs, Word documents, Excel sheets, and other file types using {{ProdShortName}} in your {{EnvNameShort}} apps.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust document parsing library for {{EnvName}} developers. It allows you to extract images, text, hyperlinks, and structured data from popular file formats like PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and others — all without needing any third-party applications.

formats.title: Supported formats for image extraction
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} enables accurate image extraction from a wide range of document and image formats. Check the list below for commonly supported types.

examples.comment_1: Open the document containing images using {{textParser}}
examples.comment_2: Extract all embedded images from the file
examples.comment_3: Handle cases where no images are found
examples.comment_4: Process or save the retrieved images

steps.title: Steps to extract images from {{FileformatCap}} in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), you can extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} documents in your {{EnvName}} projects in just a few steps:
content.step_2: Retrieve image elements from the document.
content.step_3: Use the extracted images as needed in your workflow.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document content extraction
more_features.description: {{ProdShortName}} offers more than just image extraction — you can also extract raw text, hyperlinks, metadata, and structured content for advanced automation scenarios.
more_features.image_description: Image extraction and document parsing workflow

feature_1.title: Extract images from multiple formats
feature_1.content: Pull out embedded images from a variety of file formats, including DOCX, PDF, PPTX, XLSX, and image files like PNG, JPG, and TIFF.

feature_2.title: Preserve original image quality
feature_2.content: Images are extracted with high fidelity, maintaining their original resolution, format, and color profile.

feature_3.title: Advanced extraction options
feature_3.content: Customize image extraction with filtering by page, format, or resolution, and support for multi-page documents.

code_1.title: How to extract and save images from a PDF document
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to extract all image assets from a PDF file and save them to the local file system.
code_1.comment_1: Load the PDF using the {{textParser}} class
code_1.comment_2: Extract embedded images from the file
code_1.comment_3: Set output format and image options (e.g., PNG)
code_1.comment_4: Write the extracted images to disk
